Plot: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.
Title: Mars Needs Moms
Writer: Simon Wells (screenplay), Wendy Wells (screenplay), Berkeley Breathed (book)
Actors: Seth Green, Dan Fogler, Joan Cusack, Elisabeth Harnois
tomatoConsensus: The cast is solid and it's visually well-crafted, but Mars Needs Moms suffers from a lack of imagination and heart.
